male.description: 8-year-old boy, red jacket, green backpack with owl keychain, blond hair under black beanie, blue eyes, curious and adventurous.
10-year-old boy, blue cap, striped sweater, messy dark brown hair, brown eyes, wide smile, always carries a pocket knife.
9-year-old boy, yellow raincoat, muddy rubber boots, curly black hair, green eyes, loves jumping in puddles.
11-year-old boy, white t-shirt, jeans, tousled brown hair, round glasses, book in hand, thoughtful and shy.
9-year-old boy, blue hoodie, green shorts, short curly black hair, brown eyes, always eager to explore.
10-year-old boy, yellow t-shirt with sun design, denim shorts, red sandals, carries superhero stickered water bottle.
11-year-old boy, white and blue striped shirt, dark pants, short dark brown hair, carries collectible card bag, warm smile.
8-year-old boy, red t-shirt, beige shorts, bright red sneakers, curly black hair in small braids, carries blue stuffed animal.

female.description: 8-year-old girl, pink dress, pink sandals, blonde curls, green eyes, shy but friendly, carries a teddy bear.
10-year-old girl, green sweater, blue jeans, short black hair, brown eyes, backpack with city stickers, confident.
9-year-old girl, yellow skirt, striped red/white shirt, red sneakers, curly red hair, mischievous blue eyes, carries jump rope.
11-year-old girl, purple jacket, light sneakers, long black braid, dark brown eyes, carries notebook, imaginative.
9-year-old girl, purple dress, braided black hair with colorful beads, dark brown eyes, warm smile, holds a doll.
10-year-old girl, green tunic with flower embroidery, pink leggings, long black braid, dark eyes, loves drawing.
8-year-old girl, red skirt, white shirt with flower print, yellow sandals, curly dark brown hair in ponytails, wears butterfly clip.
11-year-old girl, pink jacket, blue jeans, straight black shoulder-length hair, dark brown eyes, carries a paper kite.
